pages.text: A custom script has been provided for server owners which allows being able to quickly remove crafting chunkloaders(to limit lag) and other problem items. $(br)There is also a spot that shows how to adjust starting items. $(br2)You can find this in the scripts folder.
Also provided are a number of debugging tools. $(li)Spark $(li)LagGoggles $(li)Blood Debug $(li)ChickenChunks $(li)Sampler
